data.lyric:
[ti:The Way I Loved You (Taylor's Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Way I Loved You (Taylor's Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:08.01]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/John Rich
[00:16.03]Composed by：Taylor Swift/John Rich
[00:24.05]He is sensible and so incredible
[00:29.59]And all my single friends are jealous
[00:35.29]
[00:35.97]He says everything I need to hear and it's like
[00:41.99]I couldn't ask for anything better
[00:47.89]He opens up my door and I get into his car
[00:53.51]And he says you look beautiful tonight
[00:58.71]And I feel perfectly fine
[01:01.69]But I miss screaming and fighting and kissing in the rain
[01:05.41]And it's 2AM and I'm cursing your name
[01:08.68]You're so in love that you act insane
[01:11.52]And that's the way I loved you
[01:15.14]Breaking down and coming undone
[01:17.41]It's a roller coaster kind of rush
[01:20.35]And I never knew I could feel that much
[01:23.31]And that's the way I loved you
[01:29.42]
[01:38.58]He respects my space
[01:41.04]And never makes me wait
[01:44.03]And he calls exactly when he says he will
[01:49.73]
[01:50.54]He's close to my mother
[01:53.46]Talks business with my father
[01:56.31]He's charming and endearing
[01:58.77]And I'm comfortable
[02:01.46]But I miss screaming and fighting and kissing in the rain
[02:05.06]And it's 2AM and I'm cursing your name
[02:08.28]You're so in love that you acted insane
[02:11.09]And that's the way I loved you
[02:14.69]Breaking down and coming undone
[02:17.00]It's a roller coaster kind of rush
[02:19.91]And I never knew I could feel that much
[02:22.94]And that's the way I loved you
[02:29.25]
[02:38.22]He can't see the smile I'm faking
[02:42.64]And my heart's not breaking
[02:45.46]'Cause I'm not feeling anything at all
[02:49.74]And you were wild and crazy
[02:53.12]Just so frustrating
[02:56.09]Intoxicating complicated
[02:59.09]Got away by some mistake and now
[03:04.25]I miss screaming and fighting and kissing in the rain
[03:07.94]It's 2AM and I'm cursing your name
[03:11.05]So in love that I acted insane
[03:13.89]And that's the way I loved you
[03:17.39]Breaking down and coming undone
[03:19.57]It's a roller coaster kind of rush
[03:22.54]And I never knew I could feel that much
[03:25.55]And that's the way I loved you oh oh
[03:37.35]And that's the way I loved you
[03:41.26]Oh oh oh oh
[03:44.20]Oh oh oh oh
[03:47.17]Never knew I could feel that much
[03:49.75]That's the way I loved you
data.trans:
[ti:The Way I Loved You (Taylor's Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:08.01]//
[00:16.03]//
[00:24.05]他非常明理，也很了不起
[00:29.59]我那些单身朋友都忌妒着
[00:35.29]
[00:35.97]他总说着我梦寐以求的甜言蜜语
[00:41.99]好似我不能再奢求更多
[00:47.89]他替我开车门，我坐上车
[00:53.51]他说今晚的我美丽动人
[00:58.71]我的感觉非常美好
[01:01.69]但我想念的是大声争吵，在雨中热吻
[01:05.41]凌晨两点咒骂着你的名字
[01:08.68]你爱得太浓烈，彷彿失去理智
[01:11.52]那就是我爱你的方式
[01:15.14]失去控制，就要崩溃
[01:17.41]如乘着云霄飞车那般刺激混乱
[01:20.35]从不知我的感受可以如此强烈
[01:23.31]那就是我爱你的方式
[01:29.42]
[01:38.58]他尊重我 给我空间
[01:41.04]从不让我枯等
[01:44.03]他的承诺，说到做到
[01:49.73]
[01:50.54]他亲近我的母亲
[01:53.46]和我的父亲谈事业
[01:56.31]他既有魅力又深得人心
[01:58.77]我感到很自在
[02:01.46]但我想念的是大声争吵，在雨中热吻
[02:05.06]凌晨两点咒骂着你的名字
[02:08.28]你爱得太浓烈 彷彿失去理智
[02:11.09]那就是我爱你的方式
[02:14.69]失去控制，就要崩溃
[02:17.00]如乘着云霄飞车那般刺激混乱
[02:19.91]从不知我的感受可以如此强烈
[02:22.94]那就是我爱你的方式
[02:29.25]
[02:38.22]他看不出我的强颜欢笑
[02:42.64]我的心没有破碎
[02:45.46]因为我感受不到任何事物
[02:49.74]你曾经是那样狂野
[02:53.12]让人无法招架 
[02:56.09]如此醉人，难以捉摸
[02:59.09]如今些许的误解却使我们分离
[03:04.25]但我想念的是大声争吵，在雨中热吻
[03:07.94]凌晨两点咒骂着你的名字
[03:11.05]你爱得太浓烈 彷彿失去理智
[03:13.89]那就是我爱你的方式
[03:17.39]失去控制，就要崩溃
[03:19.57]如乘着云霄飞车那般刺激混乱
[03:22.54]从不知我的感受可以如此强烈
[03:25.55]那就是我爱你的方式 
[03:37.35]那就是我爱你的方式
[03:41.26]//
[03:44.20]//
[03:47.17]从不知我的感受可以如此强烈
[03:49.75]那就是我爱你的方式
